name: The Great Gripsventure
description:
Install instructions

Extract, run setup.exe, navigate to install folder, launch!

REVIEWS:

★★★★★  - "Like Undertale...except you found it in a dumpster that smells of fresh fecal matter and vomit" - Eightcoins

★★★★★  - "the pub crashed my game" - Ethan

★★★★★ - "surprisingly good dialogue. i like the part where sendrot screams his name at you like a pokemon." - Pyrain

★★★★★ - "I extracted it but I used winrar and now its just a folder of files; when I click on the game it just takes me to more files" - FRESHWATER

★★★★★ - "wait so no macos port?" - sendrot
